description: This file contains CSS styles for the HUD (Heads-Up Display) component of the Tetris game. It defines the visual appearance of various elements within the HUD, including background color, font styles, and responsive behavior.

classes.name: hud
classes.description: The main style class for the HUD component, styling the background, border, padding, margin, and layout.

classes.name: label
classes.description: Styles for label elements within the HUD, including text color and font weight.

classes.name: value
classes.description: Styles for value elements, emphasizing font size and color.

classes.name: statusPaused
classes.description: Styles applied when the game is paused, indicating the status in the HUD.

classes.name: statusGameOver
classes.description: Styles applied when the game is over, providing visual feedback in the HUD.
